msg: Don't wrap messages with a size larger than MBOX_MAX_WRAP (set to 50k here)

msg: DERBY-375 - Specification of incomplete server properties on command line causes NPE with NetworkServerControl when starting the server.

author: aheritier
msg: - execute tests on plugins after maven installation
- new property "maven.bootstrap.test.plugins" can be used to disable tests on plugins
